src:
Jokowi Ungkit Pertemuan Paloh-PKS, NasDem: Ketum Bangun Komunikasi Politik
07 Nov 2019, 08:04 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyebut wajah Ketum NasDem Surya Paloh terlihat lebih cerah usai bertemu Presiden PKS Sohibul Iman. Partai Nasdem mengatakan hal tersebut disampaikan Jokowi untuk membuat suasana yang penuh keakraban.
"Malam ini secara luar biasa Pak Jokowi memainkan guyonan politik dengan sense of humor yang tinggi, dan itu memberi warna dalam suasana politik yang penuh keakraban. Apalagi dihari bahagia keluarga besar Golkar dalam merayakan hut ke-55," ujar sekjen NasDem Johnny G. Plate saat duhubungi detikcom, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam.
Jhonny mengatakan, pertemuan yang dilakukan Surya Paloh sebagai bentuk inisiatif untuk membangun komunikasi politik. Komunikasi politik ini dilakukan kepada parai diluar kabinet Jokowi.
"Pemilu dan pilpres sudah selesai sekarang waktunya kami bekerja membangun bangsa dan negara. Ketum Nasdem bang Surya mengambil Inisiatif membangun komunikasi politik kebangsaan dengan parpol diluar koalisi kabinet termasuk dengan PKS," ujar Jhonny.
text:
Jokowi Invites Paloh-PKS Meeting, NasDem: Ketum to Build Political Communication
Nov 7 2019, 08:04 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) said the face of Ketum NasDem Surya Paloh looks brighter after meeting PKS President Sohibul Iman. Nasdem Party said that was said by Jokowi to create an atmosphere full of intimacy.
"Tonight, Mr. Jokowi played a political joke with a high sense of humor, and it gave color to the political atmosphere that was full of intimacy. Especially on the happy day of the Golkar family in celebrating the 55th anniversary," said NasDem secretary general Johnny G. Plate when contacted by AFP on Wednesday (11/06/2019) night.
Jhonny said that Surya Paloh's meeting was a form of initiative to build political communication. This political communication is carried out to parties outside Jokowi's cabinet.
"Elections and the presidential election are over now, it's time for us to work to build the nation and state. Ketum Nasdem bang Surya took the initiative to build national political communication with political parties outside the cabinet coalition including the PKS," said Jhonny.
